title: # 487 - Dane Cook & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian & actor, Dane Cook. We talk about going back to therapy, how he tackled his anxiety, doing arenas, Mr. Brooks, when we used to hang in his apartment in Hollywood, Norm Macdonald, Patrice O’Neal, and much more! 

 

Dane is shooting his next special at the Wang Theater in Boston, October 29th & 30th!

 

Follow Dane here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/danecook/ 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DaneCook 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com
